leadingComments.value:
*
 * Module that wraps re-using the same Promise multiple times.
 * This allows a function to be called multiple times before returning, but only return once.
 * Useful for latent network requests,
 *  such as requesting a document from multiple sources, but only making one HTTP request.

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Find the active function with these arguments
 * @param {*} self
 * @param {function} fn
 * @param {string} argsSerialised
 * @return {number}
 * @private

leadingComments.value:
*
 * Find the active function with these arguments
 * @param {*} self
 * @param {function} fn
 * @param {string} argsSerialised
 * @return {number}
 * @private

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Reuse a function until it resolves
 * @param {*} self
 * @param {function} fn
 * @param  {...any} args Arguments to pass to the function
 * @return {Promise}

leadingComments.value:
*
 * Reuse a function until it resolves
 * @param {*} self
 * @param {function} fn
 * @param  {...any} args Arguments to pass to the function
 * @return {Promise}

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Reuse a function, returning it's result forever
 * @param {*} self
 * @param {function} fn
 * @param  {...any} args Arguments to pass to the function
 * @return {Promise}

 * @return {Promise}

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Internal call to run a Promise once time (and optionally keep result forever)
 * @param {boolean} useResultForever
 * @param {*} self
 * @param {function} fn
 * @param  {...any} args
 * @return {Promise}
 * @private

 * Internal call to run a Promise once time (and optionally keep result forever)

 * @param  {...any} args
 * @return {Promise}
 * @private

leadingComments.value: search for existing promise that hasn't resolved yet

trailingComments.value: didn't find a pending existing promise, make a new one!

leadingComments.value: store result so we can re-use it for future calls

 * @return {Promise}

 * This allows a function to be called multiple times before returning, but only return once.
